**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 190 1.1 **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- This crooked staff is made from twisting acacia wood and has a sphere of rough sandstone embedded in the top, to channel the magic of the desert. When wielding this staff in deserts, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) checks to [Subsist](/Actions.aspx?ID=27), [Track](/Actions.aspx?ID=66), and [Cover Tracks](/Actions.aspx?ID=65). **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells Staff of the Desert Winds **Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 190 1.1 **Price** 230 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **Cantrip** [_know direction_](/Spells.aspx?ID=169)
  • **1st** [_create water_](/Spells.aspx?ID=53), [_pass without trace_](/Spells.aspx?ID=215)
  • **2nd** [_endure elements_](/Spells.aspx?ID=99), [_enhance victuals_](/Spells.aspx?ID=101)
Staff of the Desert Winds (Greater) **Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 190 1.1 **Price** 1,750 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **3rd** [_remove disease_](/Spells.aspx?ID=251), [_wall of wind_](/Spells.aspx?ID=367)
  • **4th** [_air walk_](/Spells.aspx?ID=6)
  • **5th** [_elemental form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=98)
Staff of the Desert Winds (Major) **Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 190 1.1 **Price** 10,000 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **6rd** [_flesh to stone_](/Spells.aspx?ID=123), [_stone to flesh_](/Spells.aspx?ID=311)
  • **7th** [_fiery body_](/Spells.aspx?ID=115)
Staff of the Desert Winds (True) **Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 190 1.1 **Price** 70,000 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **8rd** [_horrid wilting_](/Spells.aspx?ID=152), [_wind walk_](/Spells.aspx?ID=376)
  • **9th** [_storm of vengeance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=313)
name: Staff of the Desert Winds
